评论概述: My son wears this every day!
评论详情: I believe this is supposed to be a cosplay outfit, but my son wears this as his "everyday" coat. I am not even sure it is warm, so apparently he would rather look cool than be comfortable (we are having single digit temperatures right now) and he thinks this is Uber Cool. Indeed, since my son has never been interested in fashion until now, this coat has managed to surmount 23 years of sartorial indifference. I can think of no higher compliment.

This Jacket is well made for the price and I was happy overall with its appearance.  However, the sizing is definitely off.  Chest size for an XL is listed as 47.5”.  My husband’s chest is 46 and it was too tight.  Also, it was too tight across the shoulders.  I had to send it back & am waiting for a larger size.

Honestly for the price it isn't bad, however it arrived as a wrinkled mess and it's a synthetic fabric that is a challenge for an iron. The design of the coat makes the seams of the "coat" pull when you button the "vest" (it's all one piece and the vest is the only way to close the coat) and the material is thin and unlined making the coat sit weird when worn.  The lapels are tacked down to the coat and are also unlined which makes me concerned to release them (I have a feeling the lapels won't hold their shape unless sewn down) but it makes it impossible to accessorize the coat with a capellet or epaulettes which a coat of this style would benefit from.  The vest piece is very short and would benefit from another 5-7 inches of fabric (it doesn't even reach my belly button at the bottom) and the coat does not flare out the way it does in the picture creating a very flat silhouette.  Buttons are cheap plastic and I will need to replace them.  Width size, fits as expected. The sleeves are a little long but overall I am pleased with the general fit.  I'm a tailor so I'm going to do some work lining and enforcing the coat, so ultimately I think it will be beautiful, but initial thoughts are I am fairly unimpressed.

评论概述: Cheaply made, had to cut loose thread.

La tela es suave y delgada lo que me gusto ya que lo use en verano. Si esta buscando un frac de tela gruesa como el Smoking este no es para usted, es de tela delgada pero orna bonito y elegante.

My husband normally wears a 2XL big and tall. His biggest problem is sleeve length and chest. He has broad shoulders and a barrel chest. We got this for his ringmaster costume. The sleeve length was perfect. The material was lightweight and soft. The tip of the coattails hit right at the back of his knees at 6' 4". We purchased the 4XL as costume items tend to run small, in general, and figured we could always take it in if it was too big. With wearing a shirt underneath, it fit just right. It was not too tight and there was just enough room for him to move around comfortably without having to worry about splitting seams at the armpits or shoulders.

This was way better than expected. U can't beat the price and its good quality.  I need it for a Halloween costume and I ordered up a size to a 2 x because I was worried the vest inset would be to snug around my chest. I could have gone with the xlarge they suggested easily. Seams are all tight and it has a little stretch to the material as well. I just took the button cinch in the back up and now it fits great. Totally my call on ordering up a size. I will order again from this company now,I know the size is true. It's lightweight but thats a plus if ur wearing a shirt underneath. I will be comfortable inside without feeling like I'm burning up. If ur looking for velvet ,it's not that kind of look. It's not shiny ,but will appear to just be suit material. I will gladly upload pic with the costume on. Again, u can't complain for 31 bucks and free shipping! And it came on time!

评论概述: Very good feel to the material.  Not cheap and not too heavy.
评论详情: It seems to be well made, all the seems and buttons are nice and tight.  Love the color and flow of teh jacket.

评论概述: Pretty stellar if you know what you're looking for!
评论详情: Sizing for this seems to be a bit all over the place. My conclusion is this; If you normally wear a Large or smaller, stick with that, if you normally wear anything bigger than a Large, go a size up. I am 6'3" 180lbs and normally wear medium shirts, so I got this in medium and it actually was a little loose, but not by much. I'm glad I didn't go a size up as most of the comments suggested, though I think they are correct for sizes larger than L.  I got this coat for stage performance, rolled up the sleeves, popped the collar for good measure, and paired it with a dress shirt, tie, and dress pants. It fit my specific application in that I needed something cheap that would only be worn a few times, and thin so I wouldn't get over heated. It was perfect for this, but don't expect an actual warm coat here, its meant as a costume piece and nothing more. This is full polyester, so it has the same thickness & texture as Halloween costumes and dress pants. To that end, however, its excellent! It looked great, my band mates loved it, and fans kept complimenting me after the show. It looks just like a real vest + coat tail combo at a fraction of the cost.  Some reviewers have stated buttons falling off, I didn't experience this even after jumping around on stage, but the buttons do seem like they're being held on by no more than a few happy thoughts, so I was careful with buttoning & unbuttoning them. It also arrives very wrinkly just due to the nature of its packaging, so I advise washing and/or ironing it before use.  All in all, I'm pretty pleased with this. It made for a pretty killer outfit.

评论概述: I ordered Red.  They shipped Purple! Sizes are not accurate!
评论详情: 2 sizes too small. Wrong color shipped. Ordered red. Got purple. Two months to get it and get the wrong thing! Very disappointed won’t be ordering from them again!

Bought this for my daughter. She loves everything about it.

评论概述: Good for the price, lacks minor details that would make it better
评论详情: Pros: 1. It's solid black as described and is easy to match to other clothing and costume pieces 2. The fabric has a stretch, so if you order a size too small it may still be usable. I intentionally ordered a size up given my personal bad luck ordering costume apparel, and I probably didn't need to. 3. The buttons fit the button holes, an issue I've had with other similarly priced costume pieces.  Cons: 1. No shoulder padding- you need to have the exact right shoulder length to achieve the sharper shoulders indicated in the product photos. The jacket hands like a cheap overcoat more than a pea coat.  2. Adjustment strap on the back is not functional, and purely anesthetic. It would be nice to have the option to add or remove width since the available sizes are limited, and would help achieve the desired look  3. Lack of modularity. The jacket is always open facing; the vest is the only part that buttons up, and you're only going to get the front part of the vest, which is simply sewn to the jacket. It'd be a much better value to have this be a literal two-piece.

评论概述: GREAT VALUE, DOES NOT LOOK CHEAP
评论详情: Entirely black with gold-painted buttons:  as ordered.  Arrived within a week.  This coat is a lot nicer than we expected!  It's not paper thin.  It has a few wrinkles but thankfully was neatly compressed into its packaging, so it doesn't look bad.  I will update this review as we find out how good the seams are.  Will update later with a picture of my son in his entire costume.We ordered a small for my 14-year-old son, who is short with an athletic build.  The coat is just big enough that it will fit him for the next couple of years.  It is not baggy looking, only loose enough to wear an extra thick shirt  underneath if it's cold.  When he raises both arms, the sleeve ends about 1.25 inches from his wrist.  It's a better fit than we even hoped.

The product over all is great and really is worth the price but definately order a size or 2 up i would suggest 2 sizes if you want a loose fit if you want just right then order one size up from what your measurements are at.
You get what you pay for? I would say not even that. Very disappointing. If you want a cheap Halloween costume (well I don't think 40. is cheap).
